name: Leather Sleeve Bag For Apple iPad2 OR iPad2 With Smart Cover
description:
Two sizes available:
1. Fits iPad 2.
2. Fits iPad 2 with Smart Cover attached.

* Please specify the size you would like in the order comments.

Material: leather
Leather Thick: 2.0mm(Approx.)
Colour: Natural

. Hand cut leather, Hand punched, Hand stitched.
. Designed to fit the Apple iPad2.
. Protects your iPad2 from bumps, shock and scratches.
. Lets you tote your iPad2 anywhere, conveniently and safely.

Notice: 
. Colors may a bit vary from screen to screen.
. Made to Order please allow 5-10 days for completion.
